title: India's small cities offer big room for Marriott's growth
description: Marriott International plans to expand significantly in India. It aims to launch its luxury brand EDITION in Mumbai and sees the market as ripe for growth. With over 153 hotels, the company intends to double its signings. Marriott sees a golden age of travel and strong demand for high-end hospitality in India.
